meanings.definition: A drug used to treat type 2 diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed metformins to control my blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: Many patients with diabetes take metformins regularly.
meanings.sent3: When the metformins kicked in, I felt like a superhero with stable glucose levels.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of metformins was like a shield against high sugar spikes.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of metformins in managing diabetes is well-known in the medical community.
